alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:29PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM PDT... At 527 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm southeast of Springville, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail, and isolated heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Isolated heavy rainfall may lead to nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Camp Nelson, Ponderosa, Peppermint, and Springville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
